p: Flavonoids played a significant role in the pharmacological actions in vivo and in vitro [ 99]. Also, these are associated with health-promoting effects and are beneficial in medicinal, nutraceutical, and cosmetic applications [ 100]. Flavonoids obtained from apple peel extracts have been reported effective in hypertension and cardiovascular disease [ 101]. The major types of flavonoids present in apple and its products are flavonols, flavanols, or catechins and anthocyanins with the leading representatives (-)- epicatechin, quercetin glycosides, and cyanidin galactoside, respectively [ 88].
